tasks.task: Planting and monitoring cauliflower crops in a two-year rotation system
subtasks: Prepare soil for planting
Plant cauliflower seeds or seedlings
Apply fertilizers to enhance nutrient content
Monitor crop growth and manage soil health
Address any nutrient loss through crop rotation
Plan the rotation to alternate crops every two years
Ensure proper nutrients are cycled through the soil

tasks.task: Evaluating nutrient loss in soil over time
subtasks: Compare nutrient levels in soil before and after crop rotation
Assess the impact of time on nutrient retention
Adjust farming practices based on observed nutrient loss
